United Scandinavia wants to join the Syndicalists

United Scandinavia has announced recently that they want to join the Syndicalist bloc. It's not a sudden move because pro-Syndicalist policy is popular in many circles including the government and army. Do we want Scandinavian workers and peasants joining the crusade against bloodthirsty Germans and rotten imperialist Canadian pigs?
French and British are happy to see us joining the common cause - destroying the evil imperialists. Now we are part of the Syndicalist bloc.
